title: Slip on wet lobby floor
description: Tenant slipped on wet lobby marble floor after rain tracked in by residents. Minor bruising on left hand. First aid applied. Wet floor signs added immediately and mats repositioned.

title: Near miss - falling tools in parking garage
description: Maintenance technician dropped wrench from elevated platform in P2 parking level. Wrench landed in empty parking space. Area was not properly barricaded below. No injuries. New barricading protocol implemented.

title: Elevator #2 overload alarm
description: Elevator #2 triggered overload alarm during move-in. Residents moving heavy furniture exceeded weight limit. Elevator inspected and cleared. Resident reminded of weight limits and moving procedures.
